SectionBody.Text: Nothing in this part applies to or affects:

Subsection.Text: Any policy of liability insurance or workers’ compensation insurance, with or without supplementary expense coverage.
Any group or blanket policy, except as provided in ss. 627.648-627.6499.
Life insurance, endowment, or annuity contracts, or contracts supplemental thereto, which contain only provisions relating to health insurance that:

Paragraph.Text: Provide additional benefits in case of death or dismemberment or loss of sight by accident or accidental means; or

Operate to safeguard the contract against lapse, or to give a special surrender value or special benefit or an annuity if the insured or annuitant becomes totally and permanently disabled, as defined by the contract or supplemental contract.
